00076 void Micropolis::initWillStuff()
00077 {
00078     randomlySeedRandom();
00079     initGraphMax();
00080     destroyAllSprites();
00081 
00082     roadEffect = MAX_ROAD_EFFECT;
00083     policeEffect = MAX_POLICE_STATION_EFFECT;
00084     fireEffect = MAX_FIRE_STATION_EFFECT;
00085     cityScore = 500;
00086     cityPop = -1;
00087     cityTimeLast = -1;
00088     cityYearLast = -1;
00089     cityMonthLast = -1;
00090     totalFundsLast = -1;
00091     resLast = comLast = indLast = -999999;
00092     roadFund = 0;
00093     policeFund = 0;
00094     fireFund = 0;
00095     valveFlag = true;
00096     disasterEvent = SC_NONE;
00097     taxFlag = false;
00098 
00099     populationDensityMap.clear();
00100     trafficDensityMap.clear();
00101     pollutionDensityMap.clear();
00102     landValueMap.clear();
00103     crimeRateMap.clear();
00104     terrainDensityMap.clear();
00105     rateOfGrowthMap.clear();
00106     comRateMap.clear();
00107     policeStationMap.clear();
00108     policeStationEffectMap.clear();
00109     fireStationMap.clear();
00110     fireStationEffectMap.clear();
00111 
00112     doNewGame();
00113     doUpdateHeads();
00114 }
